li.p: Drop off is 8:25-8:40am at the side door (except for Kindergarten - front of the building). Pick up is 2:50-3pm and is at the side door for all.
Use smile.amazon.com and select The Birches Academy

div.h2: Why is The Birches Academy Different?

strong.em: As a k-8 charter school, The mission of The Birches Academy is to cultivate a learning community that promotes excellence in core academics and the arts while valuing the individual qualities and strengths of each child.

div.class: sqs-block button-block sqs-block-button sqs-col-6 span-6 float float-left

div.h3: The Birches Academy oF Academics & Art
